definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: Alternate strips planted to crops each year serve as windbreaks for the fallow strip.
sentences.chinese: 每年播種作物的輪種帶可用作休耕帶的防風林。

sentences.english: Rape and barley are grown is rotation here.
After several years of crop rotation, the land became infertile and needed to be supplemented with organic matter.
sentences.chinese: 土地經過多年輪種變的貧瘠，需要補充有機質。

sentences.english: And farmers can plant them in rotation with grain crops.
sentences.chinese: 農民們可以將它和穀類作物輪種。
